column2:
df_covmis2 %>%
  gather(key = "BIG5_var", value="BIG5_res", df_covmis %>% colnames %>% str_detect("BIG5") %>% which) %>%
  ggplot(aes(BIG5_res, CovidSkepticism)) +
    facet_wrap(~BIG5_var) +
    geom_point(color="grey") +
    geom_smooth(method='lm')+
    ggpubr::stat_regline_equation(label.y = 100, aes(label = ..eq.label..)) +
    ggpubr::stat_regline_equation(label.y = 90, aes(label = ..rr.label..)) +
    ggpmisc::stat_fit_glance(method = 'lm',
                       method.args = list(formula = formula),
                       geom = 'text',
                       aes(label = paste("p = ", signif(..p.value.., digits = 3), sep = "")),
                       label.x.npc = 'left', size = 3)
